t: SPALDING,ESPERANZA - Chamber Music Society [LP] - Amazon.com Music
s: Spalding beat Justin Bieber, Drake, and others for Best New Artist. Her voice is simply amazing. The sounds are interesting and poetic. If you're not sure whether you'll like this since its "jazz", the simple answer is "you will". This is a great introduction to jazz. This vinyl gets a 4 out of 5 because it fails to come with a free mp3 download. Clearly the Heads Up record label is behind the times. ... D. Cederquist ... Esperanza ...
